title: How is Orange Caramel a rude name?

replies.body:
There may be something we're missing. There are some names that are reserved (things like the names/spoofs of pro players or Rioters) to prevent people from pretending to be them, but I couldn't place any reason this particular name would be such.

Your best bet would be to submit a ticket to player support and ask them why the name is inappropriate/unavailable. If it was simply and error then they can likely restore the name.

https://support-leagueoflegends.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

I've figured out the issue.
I logged in with my old username instead of my new username.

There are a few reasons why you might have been given a forced name change. Depending on when the account was last active, it's possible that the Summoner Name protection decayed and allowed someone else to claim the name. The decay itself can take between 6 months for level 1-6 accounts to 30 months for level 30+ accounts. You can refer to the Support page on [Inactive Summoner Name Rules](https://support-leagueoflegends.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Inactive-Summoner-name-rules) for more on that.

If you've just transferred regions, then it's likely that summoner name was already taken on the server you'd transferred to, which would force a name change for you. As Ninox said, it's also possible the name was reserved due to being used by a Rioter or esports player.
